name: TV-Chan's Great Escape!
description:
A new nes game in the year 2023!
Welcome to

TV-Chan's Great Escape! (V1)

FEATURES

-20 Block Pushing Puzzle Levels!

-Over 10 Story Scenes

-Parental Rebellion

-A credits page featuring all of our lovely patrons!

FEEDBACK IS GREATLY APPRECIATED AND MAY GO TOWARDS FURTHER UPDATES OF THE GAME!
 CONSIDER SUBSCRIBING TO MY PATRON TO SUPPORT MY WORK AND HAVE YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS:  https://www.patreon.com/NykTV
